original: @371a rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: ya th'a la bdha kha sa ma tantra n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /

analyzed: ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sa gsum kun gyi snying po dang ldan pa //
analyzed: sa gsum kun gyi snying po dang ldan pa //

analyzed: dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad //

analyzed: de ni mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o //

original: gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa //
analyzed: gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa //

analyzed: byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa yin //

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang bzhin mthong min te //

analyzed: sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rin chen tog dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste //

analyzed: mkha' dang lhan cig sems can khams rnams kyang //

analyzed: ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams //

analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ba lan nyid do //

analyzed: de las gang byung lha kun kyang //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin //

analyzed: rtag tu mchog ldan khyod kyis ni //

analyzed: dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi //

analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni //

analyzed: du mchis bdag cag zhu bar 'tshal //

original: de la gru bzhi gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: de la gru bzhi gsungs pa ste //

analyzed: steng dang dbyer med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang ma //

original: zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog tu mnyam byed ma //
analyzed: zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog tu mnyam byed ma //

analyzed: gang phyir sgyu ma'i mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam //

analyzed: mkha' mnyam thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o //

analyzed: ru lu ru lu bhyo ru dha // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun tu rol ba ste //

original: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang //

analyzed: lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang mtshungs //

original: byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: gang zhig chos rnams snang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa // der ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste //
translated: Where the appearance of phenomena is the same as space,üîΩThere the Vajra-maker is like a form.

original: rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod yon gyi //
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod yon gyi //
translated: In the Vajra Vehicle, the bliss of the sense objects of form and so forth

analyzed: bde ba mi zad sna tshogs dang mnyam stsol mdzad pa'o // rnal 'byor gnas ni du ma'i @373a *//

original: rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni //

analyzed: du ma'i gzugs 'dzin  der  ni rdo rje dang mnyam zhing //

analyzed: nyid dang 'dra ba'i sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i //

analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang lhan cig mchog stsol mdzad //

original: rang bdag mkha' mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni //
analyzed: rang bdag mkha' mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni //

analyzed: gang zhig rtse gcig sems kyis 'di nyan cing //

analyzed: brjod bcas sems kyi glu 'di 'dzin pa'o //

original: glu 'di nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa ste //
analyzed: glu 'di nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa ste //

original: der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir //
analyzed: der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir //

original: rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad byed cing //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad byed cing //

original: rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ni rgyud kyang len par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ni rgyud kyang len par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje gzhan rang bzhin //
translated: This is the vajra word, the nature of another vajra.

original: sngags pas thugs chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing //
analyzed: sngags pas thugs chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing //
translated: The mantrin visualizes all ma·πá·∏çalas

original: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni h'um gi dbye ba can //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni h'um gi dbye ba can //
translated: The dharma in the center of the ma·πá·∏çala has the division of h≈´·πÉ.

original: gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag /
analyzed: gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag /
translated: All forms are ascertained to be of the nature of illusion.

original: thugs kyi ngo bor gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi ngo bor gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o //
translated: The mind is thought to be one in the nature of the mind, the Vajra Vehicle.

original: sems ni mkha' mnyam sems kyi theg pa rang bzhin med //
analyzed: sems ni mkha' mnyam sems kyi theg pa rang bzhin med //
translated: The mind is equal to space, the nature of the mind vehicle is essenceless.

original: gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma yin te //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma yin te //
translated: The nature of both is also not embodied.

original: der ni rdo rje la ni med pa yis //
analyzed: der ni rdo rje la ni med pa yis //
translated: There, by the absence of the vajra,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: You, Vajrasattva, are of the nature of one.

original: 'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad //

analyzed: sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sad mdzad pa //
translated: You are awakened for the nature of taming sentient beings.

analyzed: kye lags rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i dngos //

original: lha mo bzhis smras rdo @373b rje kun tu spangs pa ste //
analyzed: lha mo bzhis smras rdo @373b rje kun tu spangs pa ste //
translated: You are the vajra that is completely abandoned,üîΩendowed with the play of the vajra that abides within,

original: nang du gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang // thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: nang du gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang // thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas //
translated: and you abide there with the nature of the mind.

original: thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni rnam par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni rnam par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The Dharma of the secret mind arises.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje spro bya zhing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje spro bya zhing //
translated: The vajra that has the nature of space should be emanated.

original: spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te //
analyzed: spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te //
translated: The emanated vajra should again be gathered

original: sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro //
translated: because of being one with the nature of mind.

original: sems ni 'gog par gyur pa na //
analyzed: sems ni 'gog par gyur pa na //
translated: When the mind has ceased,

original: kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong //
analyzed: kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong //
translated: all is seen as equal and the same.

original: yang dang yang du sngags bsdus pas //
analyzed: yang dang yang du sngags bsdus pas //
translated: Again and again, the mantra is gathered

original: gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o //
translated: and made into one.

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This is the second chapter on the mandala of mind.

original: bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du //
translated: The nature of phenomena is the same as that of a brahmin and an outcaste.

original: chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the nature of phenomena taught by the Buddha.

original: gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yi dngos po ste //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yi dngos po ste //
translated: The nature of things is to abide in the nature of one.

original: de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs //
analyzed: de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs //
translated: The nature of equality is taught by the vajra holder.

original: bram ze dang ni khyi dag gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing //
analyzed: bram ze dang ni khyi dag gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing //
translated: A brahmin and a dog are of the same nature.

original: rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The bone ornaments are of the nature of illusion.

original: rdo rje'i go 'phang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i go 'phang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The vajra stage is of the nature of taking.

original: rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor nges mthong ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor nges mthong ste //
translated: The yogin sees the nature of equality in that.

original: de dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas //
analyzed: de dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas //
translated: The nature of equality with that is hidden from sentient beings.

original: de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni //
translated: The nature of that yoga is taught by the goddess.

original: lha mo thams cad der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: lha mo thams cad der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: All goddesses are of the same nature in that.

original: gtso bo dang bcas mdzes pa gcig pu 'byung gyur khyod //
analyzed: gtso bo dang bcas mdzes pa gcig pu 'byung gyur khyod //
translated: You are the sole beauty that arises with the principal.

original: mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu /
analyzed: mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu /
translated: The nature of equality is the sole mantra.

original: rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid //
translated: The single vajra awakens, and is the sole cause of the destruction of the world.

original: der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste //üîΩyan lag byed @374a *//
analyzed: der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste // yan lag byed @374a *//
translated: There, the nature of hatred is destroyed,üîΩand the dharmas of the limbs

original: ba'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ba'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: are produced.

original: der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin //
analyzed: der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin //
translated: There, the vajra queen is of a single nature.

original: gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe //
analyzed: gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe //
translated: When the vajra is praised by the melody,

original: lha yi g-yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par blta //
analyzed: lha yi g-yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par blta //
translated: it should be seen as half and one to the left of the deity.

original: lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya //
analyzed: lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya //
translated: Having taken the scriptures as valid, one should meditate on that Vajrasattva.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the third chapter on the ma·πá·∏çala of awakened speech.

original: glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang khyi dang ni //
analyzed: glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang khyi dang ni //
translated: The elephant, the horse, the human, the dog,

original: ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams //
translated: and the cow‚Äîall of them without exception‚Äî

original: dam tshig de nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te //
translated: are of the nature of the single reality of the pledge.

original: mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i //
translated: This pledge to be eaten by the yogin whose nature is the same as space

original: dam tshig 'di ni lha ma bzhi pos gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig 'di ni lha ma bzhi pos gsungs pa'o //
translated: is taught by the four goddesses.

original: rnal 'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing //
translated: The yogi who has the mind of meditation

original: sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te //
translated: attains the state of Vajradhara with a single mind.

original: dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur //
translated: The mind that possesses entities is born.

original: rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste //
translated: The essence is taught to be the peaceful one who performs vajra activities.

original: 'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing //
translated: Thus, phenomena should be realized as equality,

original: de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya //
analyzed: de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya //
translated: and thus they should be analyzed as being equal to space.

original: lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid //
analyzed: lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid //
translated: This deity is Vairocana, the nature of the five goddesses.

original: rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: In the Vajra Vehicle, they have the nature of equality.

original: skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro //
analyzed: skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro //
translated: Cakravarmi said, ‚ÄúThe nature of existence is so.‚Äù

original: gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te skur mthong ba //
analyzed: gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te skur mthong ba //
translated: The first one is Vajrasattva, seen as the body.

original: rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs //
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs //
translated: The goddesses said to those who assert the Vajra Vehicle,

original: bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs //
analyzed: bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs //
translated: ‚ÄúThis truth is generated,‚Äù said the goddess Vairocana.

original: 'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa rdo rje'i gsang @374b sngags te //
analyzed: 'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa rdo rje'i gsang @374b sngags te //
translated: This is the secret mantra of the vajra, meditating on the center of the moon.

original: de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgom pa //
analyzed: de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgom pa //
translated: That is the vajra meditation with a single mind,

original: rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do //
translated: the very three-pointed blazing vajra.

original: rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the vajra nature in the center of the abode of yoga.

original: ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du //
analyzed: ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du //
translated: In the Vajra Vehicle, I have taught

original: chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan //
analyzed: chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan //
translated: the single nature of phenomena in this way.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the fourth chapter on the ma·πá·∏çala of the body.

original: dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus bsgom yin //
analyzed: dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus bsgom yin //
translated: The body is meditated upon from the impermanent, non-entity.

original: lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste //
analyzed: lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste //
translated: The entity that is urged by the goddess

original: de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas //
analyzed: de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas //
translated: is thus to be ascertained from phenomena.üîΩThe mind has the characteristic of space,

original: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya //
analyzed: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya //
translated: and is made into an entity without a vehicle.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste //
translated: The nature of entities is without a vehicle,

original: sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can //
translated: and the mind has the nature of being equal to space.

original: sda ma ci bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: sda ma ci bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya //
translated: The mind should be purified like a crystal.

original: ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste //
analyzed: ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste //
translated: How is it to be made into an entity?

original: dngos po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: dngos po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te //
translated: This entity is not accomplished in the vehicle,üîΩbut the characteristic of sentient beings is like space,

original: sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par //
analyzed: sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par //
translated: and the word is ascertained in the middle of phenomena.

original: sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste //
analyzed: sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste //
translated: The mind is made into an entity

original: rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: by the nature of many kinds of methods.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: It is the generation of Vajrasattva.

original: ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu //
analyzed: ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu //
translated: Just as water is clear and unclouded,

original: 'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub //
translated: the mind is accomplished as the essence of swiftness.

original: de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan //
analyzed: de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan //
translated: Thus, this is taught by me,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: the nature of the body of Vajrasattva.

original: bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste //
translated: It is to be made into the essence of the fourth aspect.

original: de la rdo rje'i chu ni yi dam lha yi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: de la rdo rje'i chu ni yi dam lha yi rang bzhin can //
translated: In that respect, the vajra water has the nature of the pledged deity.

original: thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya //
analyzed: thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya //
translated: The yogin of the essence of mind should consume it.

original: chos dang dge @375a *//
analyzed: chos dang dge @375a *//
translated: The Dharma and the Sa·πÖgha

original: 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of all of them is the same as the vajra water of aspiration.

original: zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya //
translated: The body of things is transformed into the most beautiful of forms, with flesh, blood, and so forth.

original: bza' dang bca' dang mal bstan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: bza' dang bca' dang mal bstan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin //
translated: All of them, such as food, drink, and sexual intercourse, have this nature.

original: gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Even that which is taught as concentration has the same nature.

original: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum char rdo rje'i ngo bor mdzad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum char rdo rje'i ngo bor mdzad //
translated: The Buddha has made all three of them the nature of the vajra.

original: chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: All phenomena have the nature of being unreal.

original: rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs //
translated: The vajra holder has taught them to be of the nature of illusion.

original: de yi rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur //
translated: Their nature is the space-like appearance of each individual thing.

original: sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis //
translated: By teaching them to be of the nature of illusion,

original: rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste //
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste //
translated: one should definitely enter into the vajra.

original: sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med //
analyzed: sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med //
translated: There is no vehicle in the nature of sentient beings.

original: sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o //
translated: The mind is the essence of that which abides there.

original: de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: The nature of the mind is like that.

original: sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste //
translated: You, the mantrin, will be successful.

original: thugs dang spro dang slar yang bsdus bya ba //
analyzed: thugs dang spro dang slar yang bsdus bya ba //
translated: The mind, the expansion, and the re-absorption,

original: gsum car yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gsum car yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: all three have the same nature.

original: sems ni ri rab h'um dang mnyam byas te //
analyzed: sems ni ri rab h'um dang mnyam byas te //
translated: The mind is made equal to Mount Meru and H≈´·πÉ.

original: dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed //
analyzed: dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed //
translated: The pure buddha is generated again in the mind.

original: sems dub gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag /
analyzed: sems dub gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag /
translated: When the mind is tired, it is re-absorbed.

original: der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya //
analyzed: der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya //
translated: There, the mantrin should contemplate that.

original: bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya //
translated: By the nature of re-absorption, it is again applied.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g-yos mdzad //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g-yos mdzad //
translated: Vajrasattva makes the body tremble there.

original: slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te //
analyzed: slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te //
translated: Again, by the nature of space, he is wrathful.

original: de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Thus, he has the nature of expansion and re-absorption.

original: de la rdo rje sems @375b dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la rdo rje sems @375b dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of the accomplishment of the one reality of Vajrasattva,

original: de'i phyir spro pa 'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs //
analyzed: de'i phyir spro pa 'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs //
translated: therefore, the expansion is also reasonable as Vajradhara.

original: sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro //
analyzed: sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro //
translated: If the mantrin is stable, he should expand.

original: brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa //
analyzed: brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa //
translated: If he is not stable, he should not expand here,

original: lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin //
analyzed: lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin //
translated: for the body will not bear the result of the afflictions.

original: nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos //
analyzed: nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos //
translated: It will certainly be accomplished, the reality of the vehicle.

original: thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan //
analyzed: thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan //
translated: All these truths are taught.

original: de lta'i chos ni bsgom pa yi //
analyzed: de lta'i chos ni bsgom pa yi //
translated: The reality of such meditation

original: dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of the vajra substance.

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya //
translated: The mind that is equal to space should not be disparaged,

original: gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min //
analyzed: gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min //
translated: nor is it sullied by any stain.

original: kye rnal 'byor pa /
analyzed: kye rnal 'byor pa /
translated: O yogin!

original: bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The Bhagavatƒ´, the mother, is the nature of the first [buddha],

original: rdo rje bskyed par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bskyed par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pa'o //
translated: and by meditating on the generation of the vajra, she generates the buddhas.

original: lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The goddesses are of the same nature as the gods,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o //
translated: and Vajrasattva generates the wealth of the buddhas.

original: rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pa'i sems dang ni //
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pa'i sems dang ni //
translated: By holding the mind in meditation,

original: yi ge h'um gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur //
translated: and also by the syllable h≈´·πÉ, it will be accomplished.

original: brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam rtog pa'i //
analyzed: brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam rtog pa'i //
translated: And in the thighs and legs,üîΩ

original: rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The thighs and feet are not the object of discursive thought.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni //
translated: This very wheel of the three worlds

original: rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings //
translated: is bound by the light rays of the vajra.üîΩThe mantrin should emanate in the sky

original: sngags pas nam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha //üîΩbye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste //
analyzed: sngags pas nam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha // bye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste //
translated: myriads of wrathful deities.üîΩThey should again be gathered into the vajraüîΩthat has become of a single nature.

original: gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni //
analyzed: gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni //
translated: The nature of the mind is the vehicle of enlightenment;üîΩenlightenment also is the nature of the mind.üîΩBoth are the nature of the mind, the vehicle;

original: slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin //
analyzed: slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin //
translated: the mind also is of the nature of space.üîΩCHAPTER VüîΩThe nature of the mind is the vehicle of enlightenment;

original: byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang bzhin te //üîΩbyang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang bzhin te // byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: enlightenment also is the nature of the mind.üîΩBoth are the nature of the mind, the vehicle;üîΩthe mind also is of the nature of space.üîΩCHAPTER VüîΩThe nature of the mind is the vehicle of enlightenment;üîΩenlightenment also is the nature of the mind.üîΩBoth are the nature of the mind, the vehicle;

original: gnyis ka rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste //

original: sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no //

translated: the mind also is of the nature of space.üîΩCHAPTER V
